articles.author: Stuart Heritage
articles.title: ‘Having an adorable 15lb mutt as a hero made my job a little bit easier’: Strays director Josh Greenbaum - The Guardian
articles.description: This doggy adult comedy is unrelentingly gag-filled, foul-mouthed – and coming to a cinema near you. Its director talks about striving for a four-legged Stand By Me vibe, and how he adopted one of his star performers
articles.content: Strays may be a film about talking dogs but it boasts an obscenely stacked cast. Theres Will Ferrell, revisiting the sweet naivety of his Elf era. Theres Jamie Foxx, having more fun than hes visibly … [+7892 chars]

articles.author: Aliya Chaudhry
articles.title: Hozier - 'Unreal Unearth' review: Epic, expansive and ethereal - NME
articles.description: On his third album, the Irish sing-songwriter utilizes simplicity and space while venturing into new sonic territory — Read the NME review
articles.content: When Hozier featured on Meduzas dance track Tell It To My Heart, it was a shock for fans of the Irish singer-songwriter, who know him for his introspective indie-folk songs. The two-part opening of h… [+3092 chars]
